Package no.geosoft.timeseriesio.util

Class JsonUtil

java.lang.Object
no.geosoft.timeseriesio.util.JsonUtil
public final class JsonUtil extends Object
A collection of utilities for working with Json data.
Author:
Petroware AS

  • Method Details

    • encode

      public static String encode(String text)
      Encode the given string by appropriate escape sequences so that it can be used as a JSON literal.

      NOTE: The returned value includes surrounding quotes.

      Parameters:
      text - Text to encode. Non-null. Without quotes.
      Returns:
      Encoded text. Never null. Includes surrounding quotes.

    • add

      public static void add(javax.json.JsonObjectBuilder jsonObjectBuilder, String key, Object value)
      Add the specified key/value to the given JSON object builder.
      Parameters:
      jsonObjectBuilder - JSON object builder to add to. Non-null.
      key - Key to add. Non-null.
      value - Value of key. May be null.

    • add

      public static void add(javax.json.JsonArrayBuilder jsonArrayBuilder, Object value)
      Add the specified value to the given JSON array builder.
      Parameters:
      jsonArrayBuilder - JSON array builder to add to. Non-null.
      value - Value to add. May be null.

    • getValue

      public static Object getValue(javax.json.JsonValue jsonValue)
      Return the fundamental value of the specified JSON value.
      Parameters:
      jsonValue - JSON value to get fundamental value from. Non-null.
      Returns:
      Requested value. May be null, if jsonValue is of NULL type.

    • getDoubleArray

      public static double[] getDoubleArray(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray)
      Get the specified JSON array as a double array.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - JSON value to convert. Non-null.
      Returns:
      The requested double array. Never null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If jsopnArray is null.

    • containsObjects

      public static boolean containsObjects(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray)
      Check if the specified JSON array contains any JSON objects.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - JSON array to check. Non-null.
      Returns:
      True if the array contains any JSON objects, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If jsopnArray is null.

    • readJsonObject

      public static javax.json.JsonObjectBuilder readJsonObject(javax.json.stream.JsonParser jsonParser)
      Read a JSON object from the current location of the JSON parser.
      Parameters:
      jsonParser - The JSON parser. Non-null.
      Returns:
      The JSON object builder. Never null.
